modName: Female-Male-Werewolf Merge of Derrax and Mustard421 mods
summary:
I wanted to add realism to Skyrim werewolves so i wanted to use the mod from Derrax (male werewolves - animal version) and the female werewolf mod from Moutarde421 but i could not use both at the same time so i clumsily combined them in the skyrim editor.


Enjoy!

Installation:
Drag the data folder onto your
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to add realism to Skyrim werewolves so i wanted to use the mod from Derrax (male werewolves - animal version) and the female werewolf mod from Moutarde421 but i could not use both at the same time so i clumsily combined them in the skyrim editor.

Enjoy!
Installation:
Drag the data folder onto your skyrim data folder, assuming you know what you are doing... shouldnt have to overwrite anythind unless you have already installed appearance changing werewolf mod.
Creadits:
All goes to Derrex and Moutarde421, I only combined their works.
